The {{translation|'''Uchiha Style Kenjutsu'''|うちは流剣術|Uchiha Ryū Kenjutsu}} is a unique style of [[kenjutsu]] developed and mastered by [[Sasuke Uchiha]], who passed on the skill to his student [[Boruto]]. 

This style of kenjutsu utilises moves similar to Japanese ''[[Wikipedia:Iaido|iai]]'', where the enemy is slashed at the same moment the user draws their sword from its sheath. 

[[Lightning Release]] chakra can also be used to coat the blade and increase its sharpness.<ref name="vjumpbd"/>
